entry.title: kitt-vl/xdebug-perl-client
entry.summary:
console client for php (and other) debugger whith XDBG protocol. Written on Perl

PROGRAM Console client for DBGp protorol. Primary designed for debug php with xdebug extension.

AUTHOR kitt kitt-vl@ya.ru
